description: This file defines the interface IZigWave for ZigBee Wave functionality within the WPEFramework project. It declares methods for managing device acceptance, retrieving device information, listing devices, and binding/unbinding devices.

classes.name: IZigWave
classes.description: Interface for ZigBee Wave functionalities, such as device acceptance, device info retrieval, device listing, and binding/unbinding devices.

methods.name: Permutable
methods.description: Checks if a device at a specific address can be permuted (accepted or rejected into the network).

methods.name: Device
methods.description: Retrieves metadata of a device with a given ID.

methods.name: Devices
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all currently available device IDs.

methods.name: Bind
methods.description: Binds a source device to a destination device.

methods.name: Unbind
methods.description: Unbinds a source device from a destination device.

ctags.name: IZigWave
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL IZigWave : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
